name: Unliving Robots
description:
In the year 3203 A.D, a virus has infested the AI security drones on Mars. This infested, dubbed “the UnLiving” by humans, are planning an attack on Earth. Play as a cyborg to infiltrate and destroy this new threat on Mars in a fast paced co-op action game.

Developers: Nijastan Kirupa, Khizer Mahboob

Made using Unity.
